issue.title: [R] Add tests from dplyr/test-mutate.r
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11755](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11755). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Review https://github.com/tidyverse/dplyr/blob/master/tests/testthat/test-mutate.r and port tests over to arrow as needed to see if there are edge cases we aren't covering appropriately.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11755?focusedCommentId=17565601) by @toddfarmer:*
This issue was last updated over 90 days ago, which may be an indication it is no longer being actively worked. To better reflect the current state, the issue is being unassigned. Please feel free to re-take assignment of the issue if it is being actively worked, or if you plan to start that work soon.
